revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London - November 18, 1880
tldr: This article presents a list of introductions, addresses, and observations from the Royal Society's meeting on November 18, 1880. It also includes a report on bookbinding as a fine art, mechanical art, and manufacture by Henry B. Wheatley.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Art and Cultural History
